text: The 1982-83 Austrian Cup was the national cup in Austrian football. FK Austria Wien were the defending champions. Austria Soccer == Second round == First round with teams from the first league league. ==Round of 32== First round with teams from the first league. ==Round of 16== ==Quarter finals== ==Semi- finals== ==Final== *First match *SK Rapid Wien: Herbert Feurer – Bernd Krauss, Johann Pregesbauer, Heribert Weber, Leo Lainer, Reinhard Kienast, Antonín Panenka (74. Vukan Perović), Petar Bručić, Gerald Willfurth (80. Helmut Hofmann), Hans Krankl, Christian Keglevits coach:Otto Barić * SSW Innsbruck: Fuad Đulić – Günther Seebacher, Vesely Schenk, Robert Auer, Werner Schwarz, Manfred Linzmaier, Arnold Koreimann (80. Robert Idl), Roland Hattenberger, Andreas Gretschnig, Werner Zanon, Gert Jørgensen coach: Franz Wolny *Second match: * SSW Innsbruck: Fuad Đulić – Günther Seebacher (46. Karl-Heinz Mayr), Vesely Schenk, Robert Auer, Werner Schwarz, Manfred Linzmaier, Jakob Laiminger, Arnold Koreimann, Andreas Gretschnig (60. Ewald Gröss), Werner Zanon, Gert Jørgensen coach:Franz Wolny * SK Rapid Wien: Herbert Feurer – Bernd Krauss, Johann Pregesbauer, Heribert Weber, Leo Lainer, Reinhard Kienast, Antonín Panenka, Petar Bručić (70. Vukan Perović), Gerald Willfurth, Hans Krankl, Christian Keglevits (75. Helmut Hofmann) coach: Otto Barić ==Top goalscorers== Rank Player Club Goals 1 Hans Krankl SK Rapid Wien 9 2 Gernot Jurtin SK Sturm Graz 5 2 Bozo Bakota SK Sturm Graz 5 Scorerlist(German) ==References== Category:Austrian Cup Category:1983 in European football Category:1980s in Austria Category:1982 in European football
